title: DryGrkm
author: DryGrkm
created_time: October 15, 2023, 03:18:09 PMLast edit: November 26, 2023, 03:41:28 PM by DryGrkm
content: Hi all! Let me introduce myself, I am a software engineer with experience on working large scale web projects. My skills are delivering complex single page web apps, building SEO friendly front pages, backend and system architecture scalability in mind, implementing secure crypto payment gateways for various types of crypto currencies and every other thing that comes with projects (DB, tech, setting up server or infrastructure etc, building mobile app).TLDR: if you want to have a high quality, fast delivery and challenging projects, just DM me and lets have a chat

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Nice profile for a product engineer and your portfolio speaks highly of your engagements but to further broaden your coverage, I will suggest you also look beyond the forum, you can also put word out on Linkedin, some websites and telegram channels, for example:Discord: https://cryptojobslist.com/go/discordAll jobs: CryptoJobsList.comTwitter: https://twitter.com/cryptojobslistAdd @CryptoJobsListBot to your group https://cryptojobslist.com/telegram-bot

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: DryGrkm on October 15, 2023, 03:18:09 PMMy skills are delivering complex single page web apps, building SEO friendly front pages, backend and system architecture scalability in mind, implementing secure crypto payment gateways for various types of crypto currencies and every other thing that comes with projects (DB, tech, setting up server or infrastructre etc, building mobile app).TLDR: if you want to have a high quality, fast delivery and challenging projects, just DM me and lets have a chat  Maybe it will help you to boost your portfolio visibility if you will purchase a copper member and use demographics to showcase your skills and portfolio. It will be helpful too your show tangible documents that will show your previous work to impress your potential clients to contact. Clients for work like this usually doesn’t hire random guy here without any proof to their claimed skills.AFAIK, Royse777 sometimes looking for someone that your skills may fit. Maybe try to watch out on his news channel on telegram https://t.me/Royse777Agenc because he works with multiple casino that might needs your service.
